alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Jasper (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 3:31PM CDT until March 28 at 11:30AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Embarras River at Ste. Marie affecting Crawford and Jasper Counties. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Embarras River at Ste. Marie. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, County Highway 9 floods between Ste. Marie and Willow Hill. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM CDT Monday the stage was 19.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:45 PM CDT Monday was 20.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 5.4 feet Thursday, April 06. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Embarras River Ste. Marie 19.0 19.9 Mon 2 pm CDT 17.8 14.0 11.7 &&
